hero.title: AI Engineer & Automation Specialist
hero.description_1: Architecting intelligent agents, scraping the web at scale, and building the future of AI infrastructure. I specialize in crafting Python-based automation systems, from high-throughput web scrapers to multi-step AI agents powered by LangGraph.
hero.description_2: Currently completing my Bachelor's in Computer Science (Software Engineering), I build scalable backend architectures, real-time data pipelines, and intelligent bots that operate 24/7. Actively deepening my expertise in Deep Learning architectures and GPU-accelerated AI infrastructure.

whatIUse.title: What I Use
whatIUse.description: From AI agent orchestration to large-scale web scraping, these are the tools and technologies I rely on to build intelligent, production-grade systems.

project.title: Projects
project.description: A selection of backend systems, automation bots, and AI agents I've built. The value lies in the infrastructure, the logic, and the performance — not the UI.

surebetbot.title: Surebet Bot
surebetbot.description: Real-time arbitrage detection engine scanning odds across 30+ bookmakers. Multi-API failover architecture with automatic key rotation. Pushes profitable opportunities via Telegram in under 2 seconds. ~500 req/min throughput.

vintedsniper.title: Vinted Sniper
vintedsniper.description: Scalable marketplace intelligence engine powered by Scrapling for anti-bot bypass. Statistical scoring with weighted median, time-decay analysis, and seller confidence metrics. Processes 1000+ listings per batch with 95% deal accuracy.

xmonitor.title: X Monitor Bot
xmonitor.description: 24/7 Twitter/X monitoring automation with cookie-based session management and anti-detection. Dockerized for persistent deployment with automatic session recovery. Zero downtime over 30-day runs.

ocrproject.title: OCR Project
ocrproject.description: Intelligent document processing pipeline leveraging OCR for automated text extraction and structured data output. Handles multi-format inputs with 98%+ character recognition accuracy and batch processing capabilities.

scrappingauto.title: Scrapping Automatisation
scrappingauto.description: Modular web scraping framework designed for scalability. Configurable target definitions, proxy rotation, and anti-detection measures. Processes 10k+ pages/hour with automatic retry and structured data export.

ortholyse.title: OrthoLyse
ortholyse.description: NLP-powered orthographic analysis tool for automated text correction and linguistic pattern detection. Combines rule-based and statistical approaches for high-accuracy French language processing.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description1: I am currently available for new opportunities in AI engineering, automation consulting, and backend architecture.
contact.description2: If you need a scalable scraping pipeline, an intelligent agent, or a robust API — let's talk.
contact.description3: I welcome conversations with fellow engineers, AI researchers, and potential collaborators. You can reach me through the channels below.
